product_name: Not Your Mother'sAll Eyes On Me 10-in-1 Hair Perfector
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSo many hair needs, so little time. With just a quick spritz of Not Your Mother's All Eyes On Me 10-in-1 Hair Perfector you've already managed to control frizz, detangle, moisturize, and protect your hair from 450Â°F heat. Now you can simplify your routine without sacrificing what you need.
details: DetailsFeaturesDetangles450Â°F heat protectionHelps restores dry hairControls frizzMoisturizesAdds shineHelps prevent split endsNourishesCreates silkinessSoftensBerry vanilla scentFor all hair typesFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensDyesGlutenAlcoholCruelty freeVeganItem 2517337How To UseSpray on clean, damp hair from mid-length to ends, avoiding the roots. Distribute the product evenly and style as desired. Use on dry hair to tame flyaways.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopentyldiol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Quaternium-80, Glycerin, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Trehalose, Xylitol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Ethyl Linoleate, Ethyl Oleate, Sorbitan Oleate, Polyquaternium-37, Sodium Phosphate, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid
how_to_use: Spray on clean, damp hair from mid-length to ends, avoiding the roots. Distribute the product evenly and style as desired. Use on dry hair to tame flyaways.

reviews.headline: Like everything but the scent
reviews.comments: Great product that does what it says, but the scent is not great.

reviews.headline: Repurchased so many times
reviews.comments: PICK A HAIR TYPE: Wavy/ Straight/ Very Curly. I have 2c-3b hair depending on the day.  This would be moderately curly - fwiw. I do have higher porosity, though. This is good as a detangle step and I like to let it sit before I comb through my hair w/ a wide tooth comb. It's nice, but it doesn't do all 10 benefits for my hair. - Great for the price.

reviews.headline: Detangles my hair
reviews.comments: This is the only thing that really detangles my hair well and it smells so good.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Light, not sticky or crunchy and vegan. Good value.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I got this in a travel size when I needed a leave-in conditioner for a trip. I didn't expect to like it so much! I have wavy hair that's color treated. My hair texture is medium and can easily frizz. This reminds me of It's a 10, but a more affordable option. It smells good, detangles super well, and leaves your hair so soft. Buying the larger size!

reviews.headline: Best product out there
reviews.comments: IT DOES EVERYTHING IT SAYS. It has helped my frizz disappear, mt split ends gone, my hair is so soft and shiny everytime i use this, it really helps my coily curly hair to be confident and under conteol. I will use this product till the day i die

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I have had this product for a little while, maybe 2 or 3 weeks and when I tried to spray it nothing would come out except weird gunk. I thought it was clogged, so I opened it up and sure enough it was clogged. So I clean it out and spray it, but MORE GUNK COMES OUT. It smells amazing but I don't think I will keep trying to clean it.

I've been using this product for YEARS! I could not find a detangler for my daughter's hair! She has thinner hair, but a LOT of it, so she is tangle city. I stumbled upon this beauty one day and wow ðŸ‘Œ it's like a warm knife through butter combing my daughter's hair now! I use it for myself as well- I have fine hair and not a lot of it ðŸ™ƒ Use on wet or damp hair, and even after a swim to get those tangles out. We've not used it on dry hair, so I cannot comment on the outcome. but every time this baby goes on sale, we stock up! my daughter does not fight me about getting her hair brushed anymore!!

reviews.headline: Perfect!!!
reviews.comments: This product is amazing! It controls my frizz and on straight hair like mine, it makes it shiny and non-greasy and it detangles my hair and is perfect for heat protectant!

reviews.headline: NYM has struck gold!
reviews.comments:
Living in SWFL, my hair has to endure intense sun exposure, heat and humidity and it ain't pretty. Over the 20 yrs I've lived here, I have tried so many products with limited success. But thisâ€¦this stuff works! 6-8 sprays of this stuff into my hand, I flip my head upside down and first scrunch the product into the ends and then smooth the rest from mid-length to ends with prayer hands. A quick comb through and I can blow dry or let it air dry. The frizz is tamed, my hair is insanely soft and smells incredible. Around 3 days after the initial application, I'll start to see some frizz (I only wash 1x a week), a couple of sprays smoothed over my hair settles it back down and gets me to wash day. For reference, my hair is that wavy but curly with some product and attention hair, a bit on the fine side and highlighted. I usually just blow dry with a round brush for a straighter finish, sometimes if I want it perfectly straight I'll use the flat iron.

I mentioned the smellâ€¦ I'm sensitive to scents, especially florals, but this smell so amazing that I could just open the bottle and smell it all day. I can't put my finger on what it smells like, but it is truly the most heavenly scent. It's not strong and doesn't leave a heavy smell after my hair is dry.

This product does not weigh down my hair, doesn't make it feel greasy or dry. It just leaves my hair beautifully soft and smooth regardless of how I dry or style it. Definitely my favorite product!!!

reviews.headline: My secret weapon
reviews.comments:
I don't leave reviews offen unless a product truly amazes me, and this does. The thing I get complimented on the most is my hair so I have searched high and low for a hair product that does it all. I have been usuing the All Eyes On Me 10-in-1 Hair Perfector for over three years and it has never failed me! I highly recommend this product to anyone and everyone. Here are some of my favorite things about this product:

â€¢ Affordable
â€¢ There is a lot of product in each bottle (a bottle lasts me about 3 months and I use it everyday and have hair that goes just past my shoulders)
â€¢ Controls frizz
â€¢ Heat protection
â€¢ Makes my hair so soft
â€¢ Easy to carry around if needed

Those are just some highlights but everything it says on the bottle, it does. This is amazing and 100% worth at minimum trying but you'll honestly probably fall in love with it to!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: love it, the product smells so amazing and is very good to protect against heat.

reviews.headline: No shine and strong, cheap smell
reviews.comments: I have thinner wavy hair and was really excited to try this. I see no added shine or softness when using it, and the smellâ€¦.. so strong and smells like cheap teenager perfume

reviews.headline: eeeh
reviews.comments: this got my hair so greasy and I understand it's really hard to make 10 in 1s  and I love not your mother's but I wouldn't recommend this because it weighed down my hair made it greasy and tangeld

reviews.headline: So gooooood
reviews.comments: This is everything it says in one and leaves my hair so healthy and so shinny. It's my go to heat protector and i don't even remember what frizz is because with this it will never happen again

reviews.headline: Best hair product
reviews.comments: Tames frizz and heat protects! Smells so good that, if it was a perfume I would buy 10 bottles. Comes out in more of a stream then a spray but small flaw. Overall an amazing product for a great price! :)

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I'm never disappointed with this hair brand. This makes my fine hair feel great, detangles and doesn't weigh it down.

reviews.headline: i love this!
reviews.comments: i just recently got this stuff and i absolutely love it! i also really love the smell! its not too floral but not too warm. after i apply this product to my hair, it makes it so soft and the product gives it shine! 10/10 totally recommend it!

media.headline: This works better than anything I've tried!

faceoff_positive.comments: I've tried other smoothers which is what i bought it for and it included the other things like heat protection.  I use this when my hair is just damp from blow drying for a few minutes on cool.  Then I finish blow drying and use my hot iron on full blast high setting.  It's not greasy and smooths my hair completely with softness and shine.   It's the best frizz fly always control I have found.  I've tried tresume, garnier, loreal, big sexy and others as this is by far the best plus its cruelty free.
faceoff_positive.headline: This works better than anything I've tried!

faceoff_negative.comments: I tried really hard to like this product, even giving it extra time before writing a review in hopes that my experience with it will improve; however, this product was very disappointing. I had a really bad straight perm that damaged my hair two years ago, to the point that my hair felt and looked like wheat. After two years of using Moroccan argan oil on my hair, it finally recovered enough that only the ends of my hair feel dry. Anyways, I was excited to try this product because I'm always looking for better products for my hair. I sprayed on the product on my hair right after getting out of the shower, and it definitely made it extremely easy to comb through. I spray on another layer after my hair turns damp and that's where the experience goes downhill. Not only does my hair still not feel moisturized like it does after applying argan oil to damp hair, but once my hair completely dries, the ends of my hair feel almost tacky, as if I spilled soda on my hair and it dried on my hair. Because of how tacky my hair was, it was SO difficult to comb through; my ends were just sticking to each other and very tangled up. As the month progressed, my hair was getting harder and harder to brush; I had a hard time brushing my hair, even after the sticky feeling was gone on my second-day or third-day hair. It was getting hard to brush because of how dry my ends were turning, so this product definitely declined my hair's health. Honestly, I just don't think keratin works for me because I have tried It's a 10 Miracle Leave in Plus Keratin before (right after my bad perm) because everyone was saying it was a holy grail for their damaged hair, and it did nothing for my hair. So, all in all, I gave it a two because I do love how good the product smells and how I am able to brush my hair with ease after spraying it right out of the shower, but I will definitely not used it when my hair turns damp (which is what the bottle says you're supposed to do).
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
